Articles.Content: Got bored in class and threw this together, you can use it for whatever you want, no permission needed, just make sure you put my name in it for the original creator
That ship is pretty snazzy. I wish I could draw space craft like that...
Reminds me of one of Scott Manley's videos, where he gets Jeb from the surface of Minmus to the orbiting ship. Bob was horrified...
